item.title: Hosting the Flashcards App
item.description: Current State: SaaS The app is hosted at render.com on Render’s free tier that gives us these free web services: Custom domains Managed TLS certificates Pull request reviews Log streams Rollbacks up to the two most recent previous deploys. … with these limitations: Spins down after 15min of no inbound traffic. Spinning up on the next request causes a noticeable delay for a couple seconds.
